text: There was a tiny sparrow that, when the thunder of the storm was ringing, buried itself on the ground and lifted its feet to the sky. - Why are you doing that? - a fox asked him. - To protect the earth, which contains many living things! - said the sparrow. If the sky suddenly fell, do you realize what would happen? That's why I raise my legs to hold him. With your little knees, do you want to hold the vast sky? - asked the fox. "Everyone has their own sky down here", said the sparrow. Go... you can't understand it...
title: El cielo del gorrión
author: nan Anónimo
